mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.title AS "title", a.type AS "type", a.user_token AS "userToken", a.remote_addr AS "remoteAddr", a.user_agent AS "userAgent", a.request_uri AS "requestUri", a.method AS "method", a.params AS "params", a.exception AS "exception", a.lng AS "lng", a.lat AS "lat", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM c_log a
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_log( id, title, type, user_token, remote_addr, user_agent, request_uri, method, params, exception, lng, lat, province, city, create_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{type}, #{userToken}, #{remoteAddr}, #{userAgent}, #{requestUri}, #{method}, #{params}, #{exception}, #{lng}, #{lat}, #{province}, #{city}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_log SET title = #{title}, type = #{type}, user_token = #{userToken}, remote_addr = #{remoteAddr}, user_agent = #{userAgent}, request_uri = #{requestUri}, method = #{method}, params = #{params}, exception = #{exception}, lng = #{lng}, lat = #{lat}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
